00025 #ifndef CCN_KEYSTORE_DEFINED
00026 #define CCN_KEYSTORE_DEFINED
00027 
00028 #include <stddef.h>
00029 #include <ccn/ccn.h>
00030 #include <ccn/charbuf.h>
00031 
00032 #define CCN_SECRET_KEY_LENGTH 256      /* We only support HMAC-SHA256 right now */
00033 /*
00034  * opaque type for key storage
00035  */
00036 struct ccn_keystore;
00037 
00038 /*
00039  * opaque type for public and private keys
00040  */
00041 struct ccn_pkey;
00042 
00043 /*
00044  * opaque type for (X509) certificates
00045  */
00046 struct ccn_certificate;
00047 
00048 /*
00049  * Shared data across keystores
00050  */
00051 typedef struct keystore_header_st {
00052     int initialized;
00053     ssize_t (*digest_length_func)(struct ccn_keystore *p);
00054     const unsigned char *(*digest_func)(struct ccn_keystore *p);
00055     const struct ccn_pkey *(*key_func)(struct ccn_keystore *p);
00056     const char *(*digest_algorithm_func)(struct ccn_keystore *p);
00057     void (*destroy_func)(struct ccn_keystore **p);
00058 } keystore_header;
00059 
00060 struct ccn_keystore *ccn_keystore_create(void);
00061 void ccn_keystore_destroy(struct ccn_keystore **p);
00062 int ccn_keystore_init(struct ccn_keystore *p, char *name, char *password);
00063 const struct ccn_pkey *ccn_keystore_key(struct ccn_keystore *p);
00064 const struct ccn_pkey *ccn_keystore_public_key(struct ccn_keystore *p);
00065 const char *ccn_keystore_digest_algorithm(struct ccn_keystore *p);
00066 ssize_t ccn_keystore_key_digest_length(struct ccn_keystore *p);
00067 const unsigned char *ccn_keystore_key_digest(struct ccn_keystore *p);
00068 const struct ccn_certificate *ccn_keystore_certificate(struct ccn_keystore *p);
00069 int ccn_keystore_file_init(char *filename, char *password, char *subject, int keylength, int validity_days);
00070 struct ccn_keystore *ccn_aes_keystore_create(void);
00071 int ccn_aes_keystore_init(struct ccn_keystore *p, char *filename, const char *password);
00072 int ccn_aes_keystore_file_init(char *filename, const char *password, unsigned char *key, int keylength);
00073 int ccn_aes_keystore_file_init(char *filename, const char *password, unsigned char *key, int keylength);
00074 void ccn_create_filename_with_digest_suffix(struct ccn_charbuf *filename, const unsigned char *key, int keylength);
00075 void ccn_create_aes_filename_from_digest(struct ccn_charbuf *filename, const unsigned char *digest, int digest_len);
00076 int ccn_create_aes_filename_from_key(struct ccn_charbuf *filename, unsigned char *key, int keylength);
00077 void ccn_generate_symmetric_key(unsigned char *keybuf, int keylength);
00078 struct ccn_charbuf *ccn_get_aes_keystore_path(struct ccn *h, char *suffix);
00079 
00080 /* Deprecated functions after 0.7.1 */
00081 /* Deprecated in favor of ccn_keystore_key */
00082 const struct ccn_pkey *ccn_keystore_private_key(struct ccn_keystore *p) DEPRECATED;
00083 /* Deprecated in favor of ccn_keystore_key_digest_length */
00084 ssize_t ccn_keystore_public_key_digest_length(struct ccn_keystore *p) DEPRECATED;
00085 /* Deprecated in favor of ccn_keystore_key_digest */
00086 const unsigned char *ccn_keystore_public_key_digest(struct ccn_keystore *p) DEPRECATED;
00087 #endif
